actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
  subquery.order_year, 
  AVG(subquery.renewal_rate) AS average_renewal_rate
FROM (
  SELECT 
    YEAR(o.date_created) AS order_year,
    100.0 * COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN o1.id IS NOT NULL THEN o.customer_id END) / COUNT(DISTINCT o.customer_id) AS renewal_rate
  FROM 
    wp_edd_orders o
    LEFT JOIN wp_edd_orders o1 ON o.customer_id = o1.customer_id
      AND o1.date_created BETWEEN o.date_created + INTERVAL 1 YEAR AND o.date_created + INTERVAL 1 YEAR + INTERVAL 90 DAY
	 AND o1.status IN ('complete', 'edd_subscription')
  WHERE 
    YEAR(o.date_created) >= 2015
    AND YEAR(o.date_created) <= 2021
    AND o.status IN ('complete', 'edd_subscription')
	  AND o.total < 849
  GROUP BY 
    YEAR(o.date_created)
) subquery
GROUP BY 
  subquery.order_year;
